key.name: hide-panel
key.summary: Hide the panel when showing coverflow
key.description: Whether to show or hide the panel when CoverflowAltTab is active.

key.name: enforce-primary-monitor
key.summary: Always show the switcher on the primary monitor
key.description: Show the switcher on the primary monitor instead of detecting the active monitor.

key.name: animation-time
key.summary: The duration of coverflow animations in ms
key.description: Define the speed of the CoverflowAltTab animations.

key.name: dim-factor
key.description: Define dimming of the background. Smaller means darker.

key.name: position
key.summary: Position of icon and window title
key.description: Whether the icon and window title should be placed below or above the window preview.

key.name: offset
key.description: Set a vertical offset. Positive values move the whole Coverflow up, negative down.

key.name: icon-style
key.description: Whether the application icon should be displayed next to the title label or as an overlay.

key.name: overlay-icon-size
key.summary: The size of the overlay icon
key.description: Define the size of the overlay icon.

key.name: overlay-icon-opacity
key.summary: The opacity of the overlay icon
key.description: Define the opacity of the overlay icon.

key.name: easing-function
key.description: Use this easing function for animations.

key.name: current-workspace-only
key.summary: Show windows from current workspace only
key.description: Whether to show all windows or windows from current workspace only.

key.name: switch-per-monitor
key.description: Switch between windows on current monitor (monitor with the mouse cursor)

key.name: icon-has-shadow
key.description: Whether or not the icon has a drop shadow.

key.name: randomize-animation-times
key.description: Whether or not to have each animation take a different, randomized time to complete.

key.name: preview-to-monitor-ratio
key.summary: The maximum ratio of the preview dimensions with the monitor dimensions
key.description: Define the ratio of the preview to monitor sizes.

key.name: preview-scaling-factor
key.summary: In Coverflow Switcher, scales the previews as they spread out to the sides in
key.description: Define the scale factor successively applied each step away from the current preview.

key.name: bind-to-switch-applications
key.description: Whether or not to bind to the 'switch-applications' keybinding.

key.name: bind-to-switch-windows
key.description: Whether or not to bind to the 'switch-windows' keybinding.
